Asteroid designations ( Number, Name, Temporary designation): 2222, Lermontov,  1977 ST1, J77S01T, 1933 UO, J33U00O, 1940 AG, J40A00G, 1951 AD1, J51A01D, 1961 XN, J61X00N, 1966 UR, J66U00R, 1972 YH1, J72Y01H, 1973 AS2, J73A02S, 1974 FA, J74F00A, 1974 HM1, J74H01M, 1976 OM, J76O00M
Observation was done on (UT) (format YYYY-MM-DD-hh): 2012 - 02 - 20 - 03:41
Observation was made by : Fornasier Sonia E-mail; sonia.fornasier@obspm.fr
At observatory with UAI code: 950
Obsv. comments: uploaded by Simon Anghel
The spectrum was published in the article: http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2016Icar..269....1F
The normalization of this spectrum was made for the wavelength: 0.550 microns.
Original name of the file was: 2222_Lermontov
